duties_responsibilities.duty: Mastering design, art direction, and ACD-ing in the creative trenches with a minimum of 10 years experience.
Utilizing healthcare and B2C background to contribute to creative projects.
Demonstrating creative leadership from advertising to marketing through a strong portfolio and strategic vision.
Aligning work with client needs and presenting work effectively to clients.
Staying updated with industry trends and surprising clients with innovative ideas.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Design, or a related field (Master's preferred)
